mapper.select: SELECT ctno, deal_code, title, hprice, deal_way, region, nickname FROM camera ORDER BY ctno DESC
mapper.insert: insert into CAMERA(ctno ,category, nickname, passwd, deal_way, deal_code, product_code, hprice, region, tel, email, quantity, title, content, purc_date, userid) values ((SELECT NVL(MAX(ctno), 0)+1 as ctno FROM CAMERA), #{category}, #{nickname}, #{passwd}, #{deal_way}, #{deal_code},#{product_code}, #{hprice},#{region}, #{tel}, #{email}, #{quantity}, #{title}, #{content}, #{purc_date}, #{userid})
